title: Rights advocates, Dems condemn lawmaker Randy Fine's comments as racist
shortDescription: Top Democrats and rights advocates criticized Rep. Randy Fine, calling comments he made about Rep. Ilhan Omar "racist" and "Islamophobic."

title: Trump's deputy chief of staff unloaded Trump Media stock the day before tariff announcement
shortDescription: Scavino is the third top official who sold Trump Media stock with a combined value of up to $10 million before tariffs news

title: Trump tax bill sends new icebreaker fleet into melting Arctic
shortDescription: Federal officials have long warned the Coast Guard needed new ships to patrol icy waters eyed by China.

title: An assassination attempt changed Trump and politics, one year ago
shortDescription: A bullet that grazed his ear and his extraordinary instant response became a defining moment, and for his supporters the making of a legend.

shortDescription: Here’s what polls showed of Trump's approval rating after the president’s mega tax and spending bill was passed by Congress and signed into law.

title: What is Liberia's main language? Trump baffled by president's English
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was visibly impressed by how well Liberian President Joseph Boakai spoke English, the West Africa nation's official language.

title: US sanctions UN investigator critical of Israel's war in Gaza
shortDescription: Francesca Albanese, the United Nations' special rapporteur, has accused Israel of waging a "genocidal campaign" in Gaza.

title: Trump's DOJ subpoenas clinics involved in child transgender medicine
shortDescription: The Justice Department announced July 9 it has sent more than 20 subpoenas to doctors and clinics involved in child transgender medical procedures.

shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s newly passed spending bill is set to overhaul the federal student loan system.

title: Trump tells donors he threatened to bomb Moscow in new audio
shortDescription: 'The truth is, he believed me 10%,' Trump said of the threat he made to Putin that he would bomb Moscow if Russia invaded Ukraine.

title: President Trump pledges 50% tariff on Brazil
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pledged a 50% tariff on Brazil, accusing the country of carrying out a "witch hunt" against its former president.

title: Senegal's leader flatters Trump with comments about golf skills
shortDescription: Senegal's President Bassirou Diomaye Faye flattered Trump as a 'tremendous' golfer and invited him to build an African course during trade talks.

title: Gamblers are furious over obscure provision in Trump's big tax bill
shortDescription: An obscure provision in Donald Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' reduces the amount gamblers can deduct from taxes for betting losses.

title: Trump administration subpoenas Harvard, targets accreditation
shortDescription: The Department of Homeland Security subpoenaed Harvard University over records related to foreign students.

title: Trump hits Philippines and 6 more countries with higher tariffs
shortDescription: The notices bring the total number of countries Trump has hiked tariffs on this week to 21. The higher rates are slated to take effect on August 1.

title: Trump will move immediately to lay off federal workers
shortDescription: For now, the Trump administration can continue with a February plan for large-scale layoffs.

title: Polls: Trump's approval rating among Black voters is sinking
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s approval rating among Black Americans is sinking, according to some polls.
